pkgmetadata.longdescription: Table One for 'Latex', 'Word', and 'Html' 'R Markdown' Documents // Table one is a tabular description of characteristics, e.g., demographics of patients in a clinical trial, presented overall and also stratified by a categorical variable, e.g. treatment group. There are many excellent packages available to create table one. This package focuses on providing table one objects that seamlessly fit into 'R Markdown' analyses.
